about.title: CELINE Winterberger - that's who I am:
about.intro: For almost 20 years, I have carried my profession in my heart. I completed my training as a hairstylist in my homeland France, complemented by training as a makeup artist at the Opera of Toulouse.
about.experience: My professional experience is extremely diverse and varied. In addition to my apprenticeship years at the opera, I have worked in various contexts: from traditional salons to progressive hairstyling collectives to special events as a stylist.
about.expertise: I welcome all hair types and specialize in: balayage techniques, progressive hairstyles, practical low-maintenance ready-to-wear looks, highlights, gray tone coverage, and creative colorations.
about.basel_story: I have been working in Basel for 13 years, 5 of which in my own, extraordinary salon «Tête-en-L'air» – in English: Scatterbrain, just like I sometimes am myself.
about.salon_description: My salon is a converted airport bus from Euro Airport that has been transformed into a cozy wellness oasis. It stands, surrounded by lovingly maintained plants, near Basel's harbor directly on the Rhine. The location is in Holzpark Klybeck, a creative art district with inspiring projects.
about.languages: I communicate fluently in French, German, English, and Spanish.

card1.title: Unique
card1.description: A converted Euro Airport shuttle bus transformed into a wellness oasis. Surrounded by lovingly tended plants, directly on the Rhine in the creative Holzpark Klybeck - a truly extraordinary breeding ground for fine artistry.

card2.title: Personal
card2.description: Almost 20 years of experience from Toulouse Opera House, classic salons, and progressive hairstyling collectives. I speak French, German, English, and Spanish - for truly individual and relaxed consultation.

services.title: Services
services.description: All prices include a comprehensive consultation and complimentary beverages. Final prices for color and cut are calculated based on the scope of work. Exact pricing information gladly provided on-site.
